original_title: Paul McCartney & Wings: One Hand Clapping
overview: Paul and Wings gathered at EMIâ€™s Studio Two in August 1974  to rehearse and record old and new material. MPL videotaped the events with the intent of producing a Television special. Geoff Emerick recorded the sessions for possible commercial release. The sessions took place over four days in late August with almost forty hours of videotape shot.
title: Paul McCartney & Wings: One Hand Clapping
